title: Didnt do anything got a 20 MINUTE matchmaking ban
body: Ok so im playing and i use the bathroom i come back buy a few items and the diana disconnected well as im getting out of spawn it says something about being afk so the remake vote comes up and both me and my teammate say yes and after that IT GIVES ME A 5 MATCH 20 MIN BAN OML. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: You might have been away from the computer in the bathroom just long enough for the game to recognize you as being AFK. It's always best to get stuff like bathroom breaks out of the way before hopping into a pvp match where you need to stay active.
